description: Prosecutors in Belgium say he planned an attack on an Iranian opposition rally near Paris in 2018.
title: Iran diplomat to stand trial in Belgium over 'France bomb plot'
title_page: Iran diplomat to stand trial in Belgium over 'France bomb plot' - BBC News
maintext: Amir S and Nasimeh N were arrested in Brussels while driving to France; German police arrested Mr Assadi in Bavaria as he returned to Austria; and French police arrested an Iranian man in Paris, who was accused of being an accomplice. All four suspects were accused of attempted terrorist murder and preparing an act of terrorism.
